wikipedia_page.main: Claud William Wright CB (9 January 1917, Ellenborough, Yorkshire, England – 15 February 2010, Burford, Oxfordshire, England), aka Willy Wright, was a senior British civil servant who was also an expert in the disciplines of geology, palaeontology, and archaeology.

response: *Claud William Wright (1917–2010), British civil servant and archaeologist
* 9 January – Claud William Wright, civil servant and scientific expert (died 2010)
*15 February – Claud William Wright, civil servant and scientific expert (b. 1917)
*Claud William Wright, 93, British civil servant and scientific expert.Claud Wright: Senior civil servant who was also a leading expert in geology, palaeontology and archaeology
*1964 Claud William Wright for contributions to palaeontology
* Claud William Wright, Deputy Under-secretary of State (Air), Ministry of Defence.
